title: Ozymandias

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- At night, choose a house to explore, including houses owned by dead players.
- When exploring, gain a pristine relic if the player whose house you explored has never been attacked.
- If the player whose house you're exploring has been attacked once, instead gain an eroding relic. If they've been attacked twice or more, gain a decayed relic.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- When players visit you, they'll look at the relics you've gathered. Each pristine relic they see will give you a stack of Transience. Eroding relics grant 2 Transience, decayed relics grant 3 Transience.
-  During the day, gain 1 Transience for each good player hanged. If you are hanged, all players who voted guilty look at your relics, and if that gives you 50 Transience, you win before dying.

desc:
Post 3918
*My name is Ozymandias, King of Kings;*
*Look on my Works, ye Mighty, and despair!*
*Nothing beside remains. Round the decay*
*Of that colossal Wreck, boundless and bare*
*The lone and level sands stretch far away.‚Äù*
